item.title: CVE-2024-23506|2024-01-26T23:19:52.248Z -- InstaWP Team -- InstaWP Connect – 1-click WP Staging & Migration
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in InstaWP Team InstaWP Connect – 1-click WP Staging & Migration.This issue affects InstaWP Connect – 1-click WP Staging & Migration: from n/a through 0.1.0.9.

item.title: CVE-2024-23507|2024-01-31T11:52:25.115Z -- InstaWP Team -- InstaWP Connect – 1-click WP Staging & Migration
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in InstaWP Team InstaWP Connect – 1-click WP Staging & Migration.This issue affects InstaWP Connect – 1-click WP Staging & Migration: from n/a through 0.1.0.9.
